abstract: Alexis Alejandro Sánchez Sánchez (Spanish pronunciation: [aˈleksis ˈsantʃeθ]; born 19 December 1988) is a Chilean footballer who plays for FC Barcelona in La Liga and the Chilean national team, as a forward or winger.After his debut season of first-team football with Cobreloa, Sánchez was signed by Udinese Calcio of Italy in 2006. After successful loans at Colo-Colo and River Plate, he began playing for the Serie A club in 2008. In 2011, he was signed by Barcelona for €26 million.He has been a full international for Chile since 2006, playing at the 2010 FIFA World Cup and 2011 Copa América.

After successful loans at Colo-Colo and River Plate, he began playing for the Serie A club in 2008.
